Entry.JapaneseText: ワルトゥ……こんな風に戦う事に なろうとは思いもしなかった……
Entry.EnglishText: Walto... I never imagined it would come to this...

Entry.JapaneseText: 古いつきあいなんだネ。
Entry.EnglishText: You've known each other for a long time.

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ……もう二十年近くになるな。 お互い信頼し合い、支え合った仲だが……
Entry.EnglishText: Yes... For almost 20 years. We trusted and supported each other, although...

Entry.JapaneseText: 人と人の関係というのは いつ何の拍子で崩れるかわからない。
Entry.EnglishText: ...You can never tell when a relationship will go sour.

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、俺は信じている…… 国を守りたい、その気持ちは同じだと……
Entry.EnglishText: However, I still believe in him... We share the same desire to protect the kingdom.
